column3: â€œI usually prefer Indica strains, but as this is a Sativa dominant, I'm going to give it a 5/5 because it's great for what it is. Felt this in my head mostly. Not a great strain for getting that really relaxed, sleepy high, obviously. But it is light and happy. The smell is amazing. Smoky, with what seems like a hint of spice. It's unlike anything I've ever tasted before.â€

â€œQuick onset high. Makes for a great wake and bake for weekends. After vaporizing an oven full, I get relief from stress and day to day PTSD for about 3-4 hours. I also was very productive and focused. Great daytime strain.â€

â€œI usually don't medicate with Sativas, but I have found anything crossed with bluedream is amazing. I picked up a solid eighth nug today and have rosined half of it. It's extremely uplifting with soothing pain relief non-drowsy. Leaves an amazing taste in your mouth and the exhale is exhilarating. I wouldn't definitely recommend this for daytime pain relief and anti-depressant. As always, the strain just has to be gi...â€

â€œThis strain is very effective for how fast it flowers and being a strong sativa. Tastes mild, sweet, and unique. High is clear and creative. Does not blow your mind like 10 to 12 week sativas but no anxiety yet still upbeat. I would rate this strain less on flavor and effect but the fast flowering and high yield make it very desirable.â€

â€œThe taste was unreal, you can really take a hit and close your eyes and imagine you being on an island. I smoke this before working out and studying. Only down side is a slight headache after. But nothing another bowl can't fix.â€

â€œUna muy buenisima volada, recomendada para los que les gusta pasar un rato con amigos riendo todo el tiempo. Es demasiado sativa, perfecta para relajarse y socializar. La recomiendo bastanteğŸ‘Œ
Sigan volandoğŸš€â€
â€œLovely lite high great tasting. No spasms while smoking this. Could turn into one of my favorites. I would use for Day use.â€
â€œWell I smoked a fat .5 g doobie of the shit and got a real craving to play Fallout. Btw, my medical conditions very severe. If you got odd jobs in vancouver message me.â€

â€œJamaican Dream x Black Domina Black Dream 
Treat of a strain taste like a Jamaican Jerk Buffalo Hot wing spicy,fruity and woody.
Indica dominant 70/30 feel's like.Great night time strain.
Used this strain primarily for chronic pain w/ weather cold weather in morning w/ coffee.As well night time slept pretty good w/ cbd flower on deck.â€
â€œThis strain has me Rollin'! I smoked this keefy bud after work before studying for an exam and I just went hard on my study's. this bud definitely rests heavily on the head.â€
â€œThe tropics are so delightful this time of year....having a splendid vacation without leaving home!....A perfect wake 'n bake companian with coffee and fruit!....Enjoy aj" today!!â€"

â€œThis strain has soft lemon-skunky smell. After vaporizing I was waiting a few minutes for first waves of high. In first 30minutes was jamaican dream pretty energetic, up-high and with psychedelic touches. After it was effect more calming but still active. At the end was lightly physical but not quity sleepy.

I found this strain more suitable for comunication and socializing than Durban poison. Definitely day time st...â€

â€œJamaican Dream was a great choice all around, absolutely beautiful flowers visually with a great tropical smell and flavor. JDR flowers gave me an uplifted, relaxed head buzz that was fairly long lasting,4.8 out of 5.â€

â€œJamaican Dream is probably the very best wake and bake strain i have ever tried. The taste is earthy pine, and the buzz is 100% sativa. Not the strongest meds in the world, but it suits me fine for mornings especially. This bud makes me get up and go, and is very social while providing stress relief. You may get the giggles with this strain. very easy on your lungs if combusted. I like the taste also.â€
â€œLove this strain, it's very relaxing, fun to smoke during the day and very uplifting. I can stay active on this strain all day and not get too tired.â€

â€œWorks so good with depression. This will sneak up on you. It has very good taste. Not recommended for anxiety later in the day. Use a sativa instead. This will slowly help your depression, but in a month you'll feel really good.â€
â€œone of my favorites! great taste nice very uppy stativa high, it does amp up the paranoia quite a bit but highly recommend tryingâ€
â€œUltra-smooth cerebral buzz. Mood elevator and motivator. Has a good focus factor.  Wonderful fruity flavor.  Great  daytime strain to keep you productive.â€
â€œsearching for light pain relief without being nocked down by nite indicia. nice head high. can make a lazy day or happy active day nice, light on pain relief. not my favoriteâ€
â€œUplifting effect blasting my mind, it gave me many ideas and get me trough my projects, dry mouth and red eyes but worth it!â€
â€œgreat strain uplifting effect. a few hit and you get high as f*ck. I recomend it a 100%. super sativa.â€
â€œlove it.â€

â€œGreat smell ,great taste, also great smoke and totally destroy my anxiety disorder through a relaxing effects that coming first , after , the euphoric effect kickin and i can do anything in my day thats habitually brings me some heavy anxiety.Great strain!â€
â€œYou are not ready! That is all.â€
â€œDude my guy got this shit dank afâ€

â€œThis is one of the most enjoyable highs that I've had in quite a while. In a word the best way to describe the experience is effortless".  It is an incredibly clear and joyful time. There may be a touch of paranoia
column4: but not much. This is one of the most singular marijuana encounters for me. It must be enjoyed to fully realize the power of the flower.â€"

column3: â€œgreat strain uplifting effect. a few hit and you get high as f*ck. I recomend it a 100%. super sativa.â€
â€œUplifting effect blasting my mind, it gave me many ideas and get me trough my projects, dry mouth and red eyes but worth it!â€
â€œSuper uplifting high. Immediately you taste the tropical sweetness! I absolutely adore this strain. Try it whenever you can!â€
â€œthis strain was sick. really good head high and great tasting; put me in a creative mood. made sitting and doing nothing feel really good.â€

â€œSmells great! Has that strong sativa smell with a hint of blue dream taste when u first hit it. Not a great flavor when you exhale though. But definately a strong sativa. Gives a medium to strong head high that I can feel down to my shoulders! First time trying this one. Might be one of my favorites!â€
â€œTried it out. Perfect for a person who is naturally hyper and likes to smoke but doesn't want to be lazy. Not a very heavy buzz. Niceâ€
â€œSuper uplifting high. Immediately you taste the tropical sweetness! I absolutely adore this strain. Try it whenever you can!â€

â€œA nice light stain perfect to use as a daily smoke while working strong anoth to last a lot longer than cheeses flowers in a short amount of time and gives you a large amount of beautiful high grade weed.â€

â€œThis is the first time I've tried this strain and it does just what it says, picks you up when you're down. Started doing jobs I had been putting off for awhile and felt good while doing them. The buds I got from the dispensary were fresh top quality so I am sure that helped to give this one its full potential. Recommend this one when the crap of everyday life puts you in a deep hole.â€
â€œVery nice citrus after taste. The after effects are very calming and relaxing.â€

â€œGood strain. Very similar to Tangie for me, which is one of my favorites. While a sativa, it does leave me mellow and sleepy towards the end of the high, so it's also good night time staple. No paranoia, and no munches which is big one for me. Not as energetic as the description might have you believe, in my experience. Bought at Yavapai Dispensary in Cottonwood, AZ.â€

â€œVery relaxed vibe with woody earthy tastes that are wholesome and filling. I don't feel buzzed per se, but deep relaxation without losing your mental edge can be enjoyed. My anxiety went down but I did not feel impaired. Good earthy scent, sticky as hell and a smooth drawl. I used a dry flower ghost Vape alert at the lowest setting.â€
â€œLiterally smoked this 5 minutes ago and we feel happy, man. Definitely one of our favorites.â€
â€œVery nice sativa. Left me with a wonderful taste in my mouth.â€
â€œloved it, one of the best highs ive experienced. definitely going to get more of it asapâ€
â€œAwesome bud! Smells great, taste great and hits smooth! Nice high that won't slow you down!â€

â€œThis was not for me. If you are prone to anxiety, you might get horrible paranoia off this.  I did, with none of the calming effects. I now smoke only Blue Dream, ALSO a hybrid, but just has a totally different effect on me. Jamaican Dream stank, too. Blech.â€
â€œMild cerebral buzz but a knockout body high with the constant tightening of muscles.Great strain for an exhausted body after hard training etc.â€
â€œReally tropical tasting/smelling , great calming buzz for a sativa. 5 stars for me!â€
â€œGreat energetic and euphoric high.  My only gripe with this strain is the longevity of the high is short lived.â€
â€œVariety very energizing, antidepressant, Ideal to start the dayâ€
â€œtan wenos finos a cagarseâ€
â€œConsidering all traditional Jamaican strains... This truly lives up to it's name sake. With enough strength and floral aroma. This is a strong but very pleasant strain indeed.â€
â€œGood experience, you should definately try itâ€

â€œProvided me with almost immediate relief from head pressure and light sensitivity! Awesome strain. Lots of energy, not a munchies inducer, for me at least. Coupled with some great music and coffee (it is a little harsh on my super sensitive throat, warm beverage helps me with that), my house is looking really good. Great for mood, as well. It is worth giving it a try if you haven't already done so.â€
